A/RPorTwin

A/RPorTwin Summary Card

January 2020 -

CI3, UPM, AGS, KTH, and Ferrovial

professional

active

Development of an Airport Digital Twin tested in the Arberdreen International Airport. FIWARE is the reference technology used for the communication among all the components. The objective is generalize and standardize tasks in airport management.
